paragraphs.text:
%md
# About This Exercise
**Title:** Create the HDFS encrypted directory cloudhr tenant
**Objectives:** 
            Create HDFS directory for cloudhr 
            Assign a key for an encryption zone 
            Create the required file system for Hive databases
**File locations:** none
**Successful outcome:** Create tenant file system for cloudhr
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Ranger

---

msg.data:
About This Exercise

Title: Create the HDFS encrypted directory cloudhr tenant
Objectives:

        Create HDFS directory for cloudhr 
        Assign a key for an encryption zone 
        Create the required file system for Hive databases

File locations: none
Successful outcome: Create tenant file system for cloudhr
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Ranger

paragraphs.title: 1 - Verify the list of keys
paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hadoop key list -metadata"

msg.data:
Password: Listing keys for KeyProvider: org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.kms.LoadBalancingKMSClientProvider@7fee8714
cloudsale_key : cipher: AES/CTR/NoPadding, length: 128, description: Encryption key for cloudsale, created: Sun Apr 03 15:28:14 PDT 2022, version: 1, attributes: [key.acl.name=cloudsale_key] 
cloudhr_key : cipher: AES/CTR/NoPadding, length: 128, description: Encryption key for cloudhr, created: Sun Apr 03 15:28:49 PDT 2022, version: 1, attributes: [key.acl.name=cloudhr_key] 
hive-key : cipher: AES/CTR/NoPadding, length: 128, description: , created: Fri Apr 01 04:41:26 PDT 2022, version: 1, attributes: [key.acl.name=hive-key]

paragraphs.title: 2 - Create tenant directories for cloudhr
paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /tenant/cloudhr" 
echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -chown hdfs:supergroup /tenant"
echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -chown hive:hive /tenant/cloudhr"

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -ls /tenant"

msg.data:
Password: Password: Password: Password: Found 2 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:48 /tenant/cloudsale

paragraphs.title: 3 - Assign a key to the encryption zone
paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs crypto -createZone -keyName cloudhr_key -path /tenant/cloudhr"

paragraphs.title: 5 - Create Hive directories for cloudhr
paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /tenant/cloudhr/data"
echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive"
echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /tenant/cloudhrwarehouse/tablespace/managed/hive"

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -chown -R hive:hive /tenant/cloudhr"

echo BadPass@1 | su -l allan_admin -c "hdfs dfs -ls -R /tenant/cloudhr"

msg.data:
Password: Password: Password: Password: Password: drwxrwxrwt   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/.Trash
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/data
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/warehouse
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external
drwxr-xr-x   - hive hive          0 2022-04-03 15:51 /tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive

paragraphs.title: A - Delete the tenant directory cloudhr
